  • Method Details

    • chunkHeaderLength

      public static int chunkHeaderLength()
      The length of the fixed-size chunk header.

      So far, the header only consists of one field holding the length of the chunk content. See Binary.lengthLength(). And an crc32 checksum of the chunk content length In the future, the header might contain validation values like protocol name, version, byte order, etc.
      Maybe, the consequence will be a dynamically sized header, meaning there

      Returns:
      The length of the fixed-size chunk header.
